# zentral_gws_connection (Data Source)

The data source `zentral_gws_connection` allows details of a Google Workspace connection to be retrieved by its `ID` or its `name`.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) `ID` of the Google Workspace connection (UUID).
- `name` (String) Name of the Google Workspace connection.
